pasugiya mahamathiwaranayen parajaya wimen pasuwa e.ja.pa. jathika layisthuwen parlimenthuwata pamina pin aැmathikamak labagena koti prakoti gananin mahajana mudal kabasiniya kirimata amatharawa, hitapu janadhipathi mahin da rajapaksha mahathage deshapalana nayakathwaya saha hitapu aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathage paripalana nayakathwaya yatathe kriyathmaka karana lada manushika meheyuma magin lada jayagrahanaya hethuwen jathika saha jathyanthara washayen ape mawbima lada kirthi namaya, sudukodi musawadaya saha thawath eki noki desha drohi prakasha thulin ewakata yudha hamudapathi washayen thaman lada kirthiyath, poduwe mawbima lada kirthiyath widesha mudalata wikuna damu obata parlimenthuwata nowa idiriyedi aniwarya gamanaka yedimata niyamithaya.

1948 wasare sha්ri lankawata deshapalana nidahasa labimen anathuruwa sapura gatha yuthu eelanga jathika aramuna wuye aarthika nidahasa dinagena samruddhimath sha්ri lankawak godanangimayi.nidahasin pasu balayata path rajayan aawrutha aarthika upaya marga saha wiwrutha welenda pola aarthika sanwardhana upaya marga witin wita bhawitha karanu labuwa da apekshitha mattame shigha්ra sanwardhanayak rata athulatha athikirima asiru wiya.

badu gewimen pasu 2009 wasara thula shri lanka waraya adhikariya rupiyal biliyana 2.1ka labhayak labagena thibe.shri lanka waraya adhikariye warshika warthawa anuwa 2008 ta sapekshakawa shri lankawaraya adhikariye warshika warthawa anuwa 2008 ta sapekshakawa shri lanka waraya adhikariye sewaka piriwaya siyayata 5.9kin adu kara gena thibe.

sama poho dinakama siya aaranyata paminena gamwasi dayakayanta garuthara swamin wahanse kala dharma deshana mese pahan kanuwa deshana lesa ada siyalu bauddhayange wada pinisa prasiddha kara atha.mema deshana siyalla ba gatha kara asa niwan magata sapaminenna.
shri lanka maha bankuwa ada (28) nikuth kala winimaya anupatha agayanwalata anuwa amerikanu dolar ekaka wikunum mila rupiyal 182.27 k lesa sandahanwa thibe.

eeka waradiyi.wayambaa thamayi lankawe sashrikama palatha.apita pol ganan giyama dukak athi unath wayambaa wasiya pol ganan yana tharamata kamathi wenne in thama pol paladawata labena mila ihala nisa.wi gowithana ihala mattamakin thiyena nisa wi walinuth salakiya yuthu aadayamak labenawa.sampradayika gowin wenuwata wayambaa inne krushi aarthika wyawasayakayan.ihala milak labena hatiyata nawa welanda palawal owun soya gannawa.
